getMobileTransactionDetailsByName

Overview

This call will return transactionsâ€™ transfer and related property information for the name searched i.e. will find all transactions which a person or company was involved in either as buyer or seller.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
No Yes

Additional Information

For further reading regarding BSG Elements:

  • Method_getTransactionDetailsByName

Request

Parameters

Parameter Description Required
op Operation Yes
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
firstName First Name No
lastName Last Name Yes
companyName company Name No
state State No
country Country No
firstNameBeginsWith First Name Begins With No
lastNameBeginsWith Last Name Begins With No
companyNameBeginsWith Company Name Begins With No
pageNumber Page Number No
pageSize Page Size No

Sample Request { "op": "getMobileTransactionDetailsByName", "uid": "TWISTUSER001", "sid": "2-4eed242594fc464787b8054ddc77de11", "lastName": "salway", "firstName": "michael allan", "state": "nsw", "country": "AUS", "firstNameBeginsWith": "false", "lastNameBeginsWith": "false", "companyNameBeginsWith": "false" }

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success", "result": { "transactionDetailsList": [ { "propertyId": 5243888, "transferId": 52443719, "currentOwner": false }, { "propertyId": 5243888, "transferId": 52443720, "currentOwner": false }, { "propertyId": 7823008, "transferId": 0, "currentOwner": true }, { "propertyId": 7823008, "transferId": 53701452, "currentOwner": false } ] } } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "error description" } }
